thread.title: Joe Bartone, Production Sound Mixer
thread.title_full: Servicecaster reviewed by Joe Bartone, Production Sound Mixer

author: Joe Bartone, Production Sound Mixer
title: Joe Bartone, Production Sound Mixer
text: I bought an $80 cart. Lightweight, folds up easy. The casters are too small and not meant for all terrain so I bought 4 quality casters form Servicecaster for $60+ = why? because I expect the cart to break after 6 months of me dragging it from film set to film set, but I can always use these tough casters on the next $80 cart. now I have a good, small production cart with great easyroll professional casters that I trust to get me through a long 12 hour set day.
